successes.title: Fangamer Retrowear
successes.description: Many of our classic, video-game-inspired designs have been out of stock for a while. It's time to bring them back.

Pledges.description: DIGITAL BACKER: Even a dollar will get you something! Get full access to digital content bonuses and updates on the drive.

PARTICIPATORY SWAG: Get the exclusive swag all the other backers get without the stuff you don't want/already have. The type and quality of the swag will improve as the drive goes on, but expect at least some Kickstarter-exclusive buttons and stickers! All reward tiers (other than Digital Backer) get the Participatory Swag as well. (Add $2 for shipping to Canada, $5 for other international orders.)

ANY ONE SHIRT: You get any one shirt offered in this campaign! Check the main page and our updates to see which shirts are available. Add additional shirts by pledging an extra $22 per shirt! (Shipping included. Add $2 per shirt for shipping to Canada, $5 per shirt for other international orders.)

ANY ONE JACKET: You get any one jacket offered in this campaign! Check the main page and our updates to see which ones are available. Add additional jackets by pledging an extra $45 per jacket! Add any shirt for an extra $22 each. (Shipping included. Add $5 per jacket for shipping to Canada, $10 per jacket for other international orders.)

MANY SHIRTS: You get any four shirts offered in this campaign! What a deal! You may add more shirts to this tier for only $20 each! You may also add jackets to this tier for $45 each. (Shipping included. Add $5 for Canadian orders, $10 for other international orders.)

PICK A COLOR SET: Pick alternate colors for a shirt design offered in this campaign! We'll work with you to find an awesome new combination! You also get three of these special shirts! You may also add additional shirts for $20 each and jackets for $45 each. (No belt prints. Shipping included. Add $5 shipping for Canadian orders, $10 for other international orders.)

PICK A COLOR SET (ENDGAME EDITION): Pick alternate colors for a shirt design offered in this campaign! We'll work with you to find an awesome new combination! You also get three of these special shirts! You may also add additional shirts for $20 each and jackets for $45 each. (No belt prints. Shipping included. Add $5 shipping for Canadian orders, $10 for other international orders.)

ALL OF THE SHIRTS: You get one of every shirt in this drive! (You choose which color, for shirts with multiple color options.) You may add even more shirts if you want for $20 each or add jackets for $45 each. (Shipping included. Add $10 for Canadian orders, $20 for other international orders.)

PARTY AT NERDAPALOOZA: We’ll fly you down to Orlando, Florida for the biggest nerdy arts and music festival in the country. You’ll get to party with people from Fangamer and rock out to nerdy music all weekend! (Nerdapalooza 2013. Hotel included. Continental US only.)

OFFICE SAFARI: We’ll fly you down to Tucson for a few days of Fangamer Office antics! We’ll give you the grand tour, take you to dinner, include you in one of our videos, and let you crash on our couch! Or get you a hotel room, if you prefer. We’ll even send you off with a basket of goodies! (Continental US only.)
PARTY AT MAGFEST: We’ll fly you to the D.C. area for four full days of music and gaming! (MAGfest 2013. Hotel included. Continental US only.)

THE PAX EXPERIENCE: We’ll fly you up to either PAX Prime in Seattle or PAX East in Boston for the most incredible three days of gaming in the world. We’ll set you up in a hotel, provide a badge, and invite you to any parties or dinners we attend! (PAX Prime and PAX East 2013. Continental US only.)

SUPER DIAMOND-LEVEL MEMBERSHIP FOR WINNERS: You get every one of every shirt Fangamer makes for the next 10 years, including all of the shirts offered in this campaign! Each time we make a new shirt we'll get in touch and ask which color you prefer (if it comes in different colors) and ship you one from the first batch! You'll also get one of our awesome, hand-drawn packy slips every time!
